bill.title: Driver's license; provide that veteran may be identified by distinctive symbol, character or endorsement.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 63-1-35, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Any Resident Of This State Who Holds A Valid Mississippi Driver's License And Who Is A Veteran Of The Armed Forces Of The United States, National Guard Or Reserve Forces Of The United States, Upon Renewal Of His Driver's License, May Request That The Driver's License Issued To That Person Contain A Distinctive Symbol, Character Or Endorsement Thereon Identifying That Person As A Veteran Of The Armed Forces Of The United States, National Guard Or Reserve Forces Of The United States; And For Related Purposes.
